name: Camp
description: Make projects — go to a hacker camp (WIP)

name: Endpointer
description: You Ship REST API, We Ship Raspberry Pi or Cloud Credits. Ping Artem or Rushmore for any questions!

name: Storyboard (October)
description: Track your art and coding hours, create a visual novel based on a new genre every month, and get cool prizes

name: Portal VR
description: Build your own VR or AR application and we will ship you a VR headset

name: Swirl v2
description: Build a website, get free ice cream!

name: Craft
description: Ship a Minecraft plugin/mod/map & get rewards! Complete onboarding to participate.

name: Penumbra
description: Ship a shader, we'll ship you the poster! GPUs for the most dedicated!

name: Shallow Learning
description: Ship a project that leverages a not-necessarily-so-deep neural network to produce some cool generated content. We will give $5/hr for monthly subscriptions and usage costs on AI platforms.

name: Hackberry
description: 3 weeks to build a Python program using OpenCV (or any other Computer Vision libraries) and receive multiple Raspberry Pi prizes!

name: Playphone
description: Build an amazing game together! Signups close Oct 15th.

name: Gamebit
description: Make a game in our online editor using CircuitPython, Get sent a handheld game console or a custom tamagotchi pet!

name: Alleyway
description: Build wearable gadgets -> fly to LA for a hardware convention

name: enclosure
description: Make a case. Get it printed. Collect stickers.

name: Moonshot
description: Code for 75 hours, ship your projects on Launchpad, then you and 100 Hack Clubbers will fly to Orlando, Florida, December 12–15.

name: Olympics
description: Work along or with a team to build hand-made sites. Win boba and other prizes!

name: Milkyway
description: Make games, build houses, get prizes like a trip to SINGAPORE

name: Aces
description: Design your own virtual board or card game, receive a grant to get it physically made, and an invite to an in-person hackathon in Washington D.C!

name: Birthday Cards
description: Submit 1 hour on ANY birthday project - get a bday card! Do 3? Get a *secret* present with it! Submit b4 your bday!

name: clutter
description:
Clutter gives you a $5/hour grant to organize your life.
You can spend it on anything that helps you organize your life—from a 1TB SSD to notebooks, to bins, or sticky notes.

name: fusering
description: Design a keyring get your keyring and a carabiner to hang it from!

name: Shiba
description: Make a game with Godot, earn SSS, and get invited to build an arcade in Tokyo (flight stipends available!)

name: touch grass
description: you ship we suffer. for every hour you spent coding, we ran 200m

name: Branch
description: Branch is a collaboration challenge designed to teach you the essentials of Git and GitHub for collaborative coding.

name: bunbougu
description: You ship a productivity/school related app and we ship you Japanese stationery and other school supplies

name: waveform
description: Create an audio visualizer, get a music subscription/grant

name: Code Quest
description: Develop for 5 hours a web game and get a $25 Steam Grant

name: Carnival
description: Build an extension, plugin, or widget. Unlock resources to enhance your dev environment and fuel your next project.

name: Blueprint
description: You build cool hardware projects (or learn how to) and get funding to make them real!

name: fanpage
description: Ship a project about something you love. Get that merch related to that very thing.

name: simmer
description: A 3-cycle website building challenge where you cook up something amazing, one iteration at a time.

name: Siege
description: A 14 week program where the challenge is to ship each week. Only hours shipped at the end of each week count. If you don't ship for a week, you'll be out of the siege. If you make it to the end, you get a framework!

name: iframe
description: Draw or edit images using any programming language and we will hang your custom image on HQ wall and send a copy to you

name: Self Portrait
description: Make a personal website you're proud of, get a photo of it shipped

name: NeoHack
description: Spend 6 hours making a nvim/vim plugin, get a Neovim shirt!

name: ARMed
description: Ship an ARM assembly program, and we ship you lego.

name: Emerge
description: You ship an example of an emergent behaviour, for each hour you code you get to add 30 pixels to the collaborative canvas, and at the end every participant gets a poster of the canvas shipped to them :)

name: Roulette
description: Spin wheels. Make games. Get prizes.

name: Bitstream
description: Design code for an FPGA, get a free FPGA! Learn digital design and get your own development board.

name: Shush
description: You ship: an ssh app. We ship: tux plush toy (or some stuff for a server)

name: Infinity
description: Ship an app or game with an infinite canvas

name: cmd + k
description: Build a Raycast extension, get Raycast Pro & stickers

name: overflow: hidden;
description: Ship a website that doesn't have any native scrollbars, get some stickers + flex tape!

name: Timeless
description: Make a video game that could last someone 10 years. If you do, we'll send you a paperback by Boss Fight Books.

name: Jumpstart v2
description: Create a game in 20 hours, earn a high-quality gaming console!

name: Gemini
description: Build and ship an Android app, Get an Android phone, tablet, watch or headphones (up to $100) and $25 for your Android dev account.

name: Railway
description: Build a site with Ruby on Rails, receive stickers!

name: TerminalCraft v3
description: Build a terminal program for 15 hours and get up to $60 for hardware

name: Rewind v2
description: Make an app that runs on Windows XP, get stickers + super cool headphones from KOSS (the KTX Pro 1 or Porta Pros).

name: Smelt
description: No idea what is this about, aW5WaXRlIFlvdVIgRnJpRU5EcyBpbiBhIENSWVBUSUMgV2FZIC0tIEZvUiBldmVSIDEwMCBQZW9QbGUgaW4gVEhlIGNIYW5uZWwgdGhlIFRJbWVyIFdJTEwgU1BFRUQgVVAgQlkgMSBIT1VSLiBEb24ndCBtYWtlIFVTIFdPUksgb24gVEhFIFdFRUtFTkQhISEhISE=

name: Remix
description: Remix this beat, and if you create something, you get stickers!

name: Squeak
description: 7/5/2025 to 7/11/2025 where you can design your own mouse case and receive the physical case and parts!

name: Minigame
description: Spend 5-10 hours creating a polished, small minigame, earn a $20 grant to purchase game development tools to kickstart your hobby!

name: Extensify
description: Build an IDE Extension, get a special keychain or a premium VS Code / Sublime Text Theme!

name: Toolsmith
description: Build a AI extension (MCP tool), get $10 of AI credits.

name: Cinema
description: Make a short story JavaScript animation using canvas, Get HQ-made caramel popcorn! (card grants for international folks)

name: Pathfinder
description: Make a custom PCB controller board and efidget, get grants and materials to build it!

name: Riceathon v2
description: Customize your Linux install, and get programmer socks or a Blåhaj.

name: Athena Awards
description:
Make 3 projects worth 30 hours, you get to:
1. Earn Hack Club's Athena Award, an industry recognized technical certificate.
2. Travel to New York City for 2025's largest high school hackathon for girls!
3. Win prizes as you code, including laptops, iPads, Flipper Zeros, headphones and hoodies.

name: Decode
description: Learn how a tech product works (hardware + software) and we ship you a grant to make it yourself!

name: Anansi
description: Build a web scraper, upload your dataset to Kaggle, Get a comic book!

name: Rewind
description: Build a desktop app, Get stickers, artifacts + a framed Windows XP image!

name: Spatula
description: Ship an app or script that sends push notifications. Get grant for Telnyx SMS

name: Jumpstart
description: Build a platformer in Godot in one week. Earn stickers and other prizes!!

name: Pulse
description: Build a project using the Spotify API with 6 hours on Hackatime, get 3 months of Spotify Premium.

name: Converge
description: Build bots, win prizes

name: Hash Core
description: A 48-hour YSWS - Make a song using only code!

name: Reinforced
description: Build a game, build a bot to beat it, get compute to do more AI stuff.

name: Twist
description: Make an esolang, get stickers and a $40 electronics grant.

name: Hackmate
description: Build a collaborative app, ship it, and get rewarded with cloud credits/raspberry pi!

name: Silicon
description: Design your own custom devboard and we'll fund it.

name: Dockerize
description: Build a self-hosted application using Docker, we ship you stickers and a chance to win a ZimaBoard.

name: FIX IT
description: Create a userscript. Get Stickers. 24 hour YSWS

name: Gamefolio
description:
You Ship: Make your portfolio site in the style of your favorite game
We Ship: $20 grant card which can be spent on either domains or hosting.

name: Illumination
description:
You Ship: a program that runs on an ESP32, a backend that connects to your ESP32, and a website to control your ESP32 and backend.
We Ship: a cool ESP32-S3 based devboard, hardware parts you choose, and cloud credits to run your backend with.

name: Summer of Making
description: Build stuff. Get stuff. Repeat.

name: Reactive
description: Ship a website built with React, get $15 to buy a domain.

name: Waveband
description: Create a desktop app using RTL-SDR, and Hack Club sends you a dongle.

name: Highway
description: Make any hardware project, get up to 350 USD to build it! Keyboard, game console, rocket, robot, 3d printer, etc... Then, go to a 4-day hardware hackathon @ Github HQ this summer!

name: Cafe
description: Collect cups, progress the graph, earn bonuses!

name: RaspAPI
description: Make an API get a Raspberry Pi

name: Black Box
description: Create a constrained, interactive C program and get a portable device to run it on!

name: Hackpad
description: Design a keyboard get the parts! Please note this is only open to those who have build a Macropad previously.

name: Hackpad v3
description: Design a keyboard get the parts! Please note this is only open to those who have build a Macropad previously.

name: Sidequests
description: A short-run low-volume low-effort ysws series from nora & co.

name: Lockin
description: Work on anything Wakatime-able on call with another Hack Clubber, spin for stickers at the end of the session.

name: BrowserBuddy
description: Build a Chrome extension, and Hack Club provides $30 to launch it on Chrome Web Store.

name: TerminalCraft
description: Build a terminal program and earn a Raspberry Pi 4

name: Pixeldust
description: Make a neopixel based PCB, get the parts to make one!

name: Juice
description: Spend 100 hours in 2 months building a game, and we'll cover your Steam release and fund a flight to China for a pop-up shop.

name: Jungle
description: Spend time working on your game, get money to help publish it! Prizes include steam license, itch.io asset store credits, and much much more!

name: Infill
description: Design your own 3D printer mod, get $20 to build it!

name: Visioneer
description: Give your computer the gift of vision, get an esp32-s3-eye to see it through!

name: Hacklet
description: Spend two hours building a creative javascript bookmarklet, get $10 to buy a domain!

name: Asylum
description: Fast-paced hardware YSWS challenges.

name: Printboard
description: Design a 3D model that goes with the Ikea Skadis pegboard, and we will send you one!

name: Minus Twelve
description: Create a useful tool and receive a shiny new microcontroller!

name: Hackapet
description: Make a pet game, get a hackable tamagotchi clone!

name: Dessert
description: Make an Android app and earn a paid Google Developer account.

name: Solder
description: Design and solder your own custom PCB with a free electronics kit!

name: HackCraft
description: Create a Minecraft mod, and Hack Club sends you Minecraft Java!

name: Cascade
description: Create animations with CSS and receive art supplies.

name: Riceathon
description: Customize your Linux install, and get programmer socks or a Blåhaj.

name: Hacky Holidays
description: Design a PCB holiday decoration this winter, get one shipped.

name: BakeBuild
description: Design a cookie cutter, get it shipped!

name: Retrospect (J2ME edition)
description: Create a J2ME game (Java MIDlet) and have it delivered on a J2ME-capable phone.

name: Hackaccino
description: Build a 3D website and get a free frappuccino.

name: Cider
description: Create an iOS app and receive a $100 Apple Developer account to publish it.

name: 10 Days of Tarot
description: Build a project or feature and get exclusive prizes for each card requirement you hit.

name: Tonic
description: Make a Jekyll theme, show it to the world, and we'll send you a Hack Club hat!

name: Thunder
description: You Ship A Slack bot. We Ship A limited edition Orpheus bucket hat.

name: Shipwrecked
description: You Ship 60 hours of work, 4 projects, and go viral. We Ship A ticket to an island hackathon in Boston.

name: Neighborhood
description: You Ship 100 hours of coding on one project. We Ship A free summer of coding in San Francisco.

name: Sprig
description: Build a JS game and play it on your own console.

name: OnBoard
description: Design a PCB and we'll fabricate it for you.

name: Boba Drops
description: Build a website and get boba!

name: Swirl
description: Create a quality website with Scoops, get ice cream!

name: OnBoard Live
description: Design a PCB live on YouTube for $5/hour PCB credit.

name: Grub
description: You Ship A responsive website using only HTML and Tailwind CSS. We Ship A grant for junk food.

name: Toppings
description: You ship an interactive website using framework-less JavaScript, we ship you a grant to an ice cream parlor.

name: Waffles
description: You ship a full-stack web application, and we ship you a grant to a waffle house.

name: Authly
description: Build the weirdest auth, get Yubico Security Keys, NFC tags, VPN routers, antivirus

name: Hack A Home
description: You Ship a Home Assistant with Software,PCB and Case, We Ship a grant ($150 Max)to make it.

name: Hackumentary
description: You Ship a project with dev vlogs, We Ship points through which you can buy goodies

name: Reef
description: Ship a deep learning project (AI/ML/LLM/NN), get a custom coral based accelerator.

name: Hackducky
description: Create A DuckyScript get a Rubber Ducky ! ( hackducky )

name: HackABand
description: ship a wristband design and we ship you fabric woven wristband with NFC chip

name: Forge
description: Design a 3D model that solves a problem and receive a custom 3D printer.

name: Vine
description: Create a song using open-source music software and receive a vinyl with your song.

name: Hack Store
description: Use a free alternative app store and get a Google Developer account.

name: Light Up
description: Design an electronic circuit with lights, and Hack Club sends you the components and gifts.

name: Aether
description: Build a Windows app, and Hack Club provides a Microsoft Store developer account.

name: Onward
description: Build a robot using Arduino and receive one.

name: Fishin Chips
description: Build TTL logic circuits without microcontrollers, get components to make them real!

name: PicoJam
description: Create a PICO-8 game, get a PICO-8 license for free!

name: Hack the Line
description: Get an Asterisk server running, and we'll send you a VoIP phone.

name: Constellation
description: You ship a self host, full stack website, we ship a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W to host it on

name: The Zoo
description: Make an animal themed Svelte site, earn Ikea Animal Plushies

name: Jetsu
description: You ship a ML Robot, We ship a Jetson Nano / Jetson Orin Nano

name: HackClub market
description: You can buy/sell pcb's online

name: Lightsaber
description: You ship a beat saber map, we ship a(n) <undecided>.

name: Turquoise
description: You ship a linux distro, we ship a custom Hack Club skirt

name: Wetube
description: You ship a YouTube channel, we ship points for every video to spend on video equipment!

name: Mini MIDI Magic
description: [Moved to under Blueprint.] You ship a custom MIDI Synth/Controller with the firmware, we make it and send it to you!

name: Glyphic
description: You Ship a cool and advanced Manim animation visualizing something, We Ship a Lamy Safari Fountain Pen

name: Pridehaj
description: You ship a pride themed website, we ship a blahaj

name: Hack Drive
description: You Ship a cool filesystem/something using FUSE, We Ship a Hack Club branded flash drive

name: Hackmouse
description: Design a PCB & case for a mouse and get the parts shipped to you.

name: The Ride
description: You ship a PCB to go on an adventure, we give you the opportunity to build an (offroad) bike at HQ and go on that adventure.

name: Trainix
description: Build an RL model for math problems and win an ESP32-S3 + OLED Module. Top 3 get an NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano Developer Kit.

name: RPG
description: Work together with other hack clubbers to fight bosses and earn awesome loot and an exclusive trading card for those who help defeat each boss!

name: Pyramid Scheme
description: Put up Hack Club posters to earn prizes.

name: 15 Days in Public
description: Learn, build, or do something everyday for 15 days and post progress reports.

name: Sock
description: Collaborate on a project for 10 days, get Hack Club socks!

name: Easel
description: Build a programming language, get fudge.

name: Blot
description: Write code, make art, and get a drawing machine.

name: Boba Manor
description: Website building with rewards.

name: Retrospect
description: Create a DOS game and have it delivered on a floppy disk.

name: LLM YSWS
description: Projects using language models.

name: Arcade
description: The summer is yours for the making

name: The Bin
description: Hardware-related projects.

name: HAM Radio YSWS
description: Related to HAM radio projects.

name: Trick or Trace
description: Design a PCB this October, vote on the best designs, get a second grant.

name: Anchor
description: Design a VTuber-style logo for your High Seas project and receive custom stickers.

name: High Seas
description: Work on projects, earn doubloons, and compete in the Wonderdome.

name: Neon
description: Build code, get a 64x32 LED matrix.

name: Say Cheese!
description: Fit a program in a QR code, get a portable printer and maybe a Blåhaj.

name: Cargo Cult
description: Build a Rust CLI and get a Rust book.

name: Winter Boba Drops
description: Create a winter-themed static website, get a boba plushie!
